name: romance and random
release_bio: The 66th release from WHY Record Company (WRC) - WHY066
"WHYCOMP004: romance and random"
Original songs Recorded, Produced, Mixed, and Mastered by Weeping Sun, Quantopix, and ofoot.
Featuring IDM all incorporating using some form of random element or generative sound.
Artwork by Ian Rios

name: Art Brut

name: He Called Me Beautiful (Remixes)
